description.en: Preparation for and/or participation at a philosophy conference. Reflecting upon the process of participating at a conference.
description.et: Filosoofiakonverentsiks teeside ettevalmistamine ja/või filosoofiakonverentsil osalemine. Reflektsioon konverentsil osalemise protsessi üle.

objectives.en: Preparation for and/or active participation at a philosophy conference, and reflection upon
objectives.et: Aine eesmärk on filosoofiakonverentsiks valmistumine ja/või filosoofiakonverentsil aktiivne osalemine, ning

objectives.en: the process of participating in the conference.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon completion of the course, participants have an experience of preparing an abstract for and/or participating at a philosophy conference, and are able to reflect upon the process of participating at a conference.
learning_outcomes.et: Aine läbinud üliõpilane omab filosoofiakonverentsiks ettekande teeside ettevalmistamise ja/või mitmepäevasel filosoofiakonverentsil osalemise kogemust ning oskab konverentsil osalemise protsessi üle reflekteerida.

independent_work.et:
NordPhil student conference (September 13-14)
* Attending all the presentations and/or presenting yourself
* Writing a small essay "What did I learn at the conference?" (1-2 pp)


Frege Lectures 2024:
* Participating at all the lectures/seminars (Frege Lectures 2024)
* Writing a small essay  "What did I learn at Frege lectures?" (1-2 pp)

debt_elimination.et: If you missed the conference... Wait for the next one.

resources.mandatory_materials:
* NordPhil student conference (September 13-14)
* Attending all the presentations and/or presenting yourself
* Writing a small essay "What did I learn at the conference?" (1-2 pp)
See more details at: https://sites.google.com/view/nordphil/home

* Frege Lectures 2024 (November 4-6)  held by Emma Borg (London)
See more details at: https://filsem.ut.ee/en/content/frege-lectures
Compulsory reading materials can be found at Moodle.
